author: Claire O'Connell
title: Putting the new coronavirus firmly in the picture
description: Creating a visual representation that communicates the precise ‘moment of infection’
content: There are many confounding aspects of Sars-CoV-2 (its medical term), the virus that causes Covid-19. One is that we cant see it with the naked eye. Avoiding something that you cant see brings its own challenges, but Eoin Winston wants to help us picture the v… [+2934 chars]
